name: Mirko / My Hero Academia
description:
• Trigger：mirko

  • Default Outfit：red eyes, long eyelashes, white hair, long hair, dark skin, rabbit ears, white leotard, sleeveless, fur collar, white gloves, purple thighhighs, crescent print

  • weight：0.9~1.0（Weight varies from model to model, so try different weights.）

  • For the back view try adding a "tail".

  • If you think even 0.9 is too high, you can lower it to 0.8.

  • Please support me to produce continuously. patreon
